name: Fella's Bar & Grill
address: 522 City Island Ave, Bronx, NY 10464, USA

reviews.text: 20/10 I love this place! Great vibes always. We didn't eat there only because we came after eating dinner close by. Service is always top notch, music great and the friendly locals are the best. Every time I come I end up dancing the night away and making new acquaintances.
Girls are. So sweet. The  place it feels. Retro

A group of 8 Puerto Ricans playing pool... LOUD, FUN, Exuberant, broke into singing and dancing when Motown came on the Jukebox... A very cool black dude started serenading a couple of pretty girls next to him, A renown fisherman got up to dance in the bar.... with the serenading black dude.... A white older white bartender.. pouring drinks.. Singing Motown  and keeping the drinks and food flowing. AND THIS WAS A DARK DREARY MONDAY NIGHT. ...  Every person in this bar embraced my wife and I, total strangers... DAMN I love this place..  I can hear the cynical folks out there sayin' " why you gotta say Puerto Ricans, why you gotta say black, white.. or whatever..  I do that to say.. in this pub.. in city Island NY.. they are all now.. FRIENDS.

Love this little bar. Bartenders are always great. The food is very good bar food. Wings , burgers, appetizers etc., they all hit the spot. Locals are always good company and there‚Äôs always a TV in sight to watch the game. I‚Äôve been going here on and off for over a decade. 2 thumbs up.
All the pleasantriesü§ófood drinks nice people‚Ä¶
Best dive bar on the island. Can watch a game and be left alone. Decent draft beers.
I diding enjoyed my wing.
Best margaritas in NYC!
The tacos were great.   I didn't really like the wings.
Lame, it's a bar that you go to and people get drunk and want to act tough when they're more soft than one ply paper
Best quesadillas ever.

This review doesn't so much reflect on the establishment itself, but rather on the individual bartender who was extremely rude and offensive to my group.  The dark haired bartender with glasses, I believe her name is Naty was extremely rude to my party of 5.

We had just came from a close by restaurant and decided to stop in to play pool.  After about 10 minutes of us being in the bar and having already started our game of pool, Naty approached our group in an aggressive and rude manner and told us that the pool table is only for patrons with an attitude.  We were all offended by her rude and condescending tone.  There was no reason for her to approach us the way she did.  We all would have ordered drinks and probably would have start a tab had she not been so rude and obnoxious.

Two of the people in my party ordered drinks, but the other three of us refused because of her rude and offensive tone.

Naty should not be working in a bar because she does not know how to speak cordially to people.  Even a gentleman who was waiting for his wife to come out of the bathroom told us that Naty is mean.

Whoever the owner or manager is needs to have a serious conversation with Naty because she is costing them business and will continue to adversely affect the atmosphere of the business.
Great place to mellow out and eat plus there a pool table
Good dive bar
BARMAIDS ARE SO PLEASANT AND ATTENTIVE FOOD IS REASONABLE & DELICIOUS NICE ATMOSPHERE EVERYONE  SO FAR IS PLEASANT LOVE THE POOL PLAYING SPORTMANSHIP
This low key dive bar has it all, nice bartenders, delicious Mexican and bar food, good drinks, variety of MIX COCKTAILS the vibe late nights is great and safe
GREAT bar, GREAT food and GREAT service!! It‚Äôs always a good time whenever my friends and I come to this establishment!
Tasty regular bar food. Rusty is friendly and makes you feel welcomed. She also makes a great mojito. None of that pre-made bottle stuff.

Best Quesadillas in the Galaxy and the bartenders are the coolest!
Spicy Margs and good peeps üòé‚Ä¶

Great local bar with great food and drinks! Spicy Margaritas are phenomenal we go every week to see the amazing manager natasha and have a few of her famous Margaritas. Can say nothing bad about fella's always have a great time and get great service!
Great food, staff is very friendly...
Cool vibes
Great place to kick back watching sports channels dinning on mixed American menu and a fully stocked bar with 12 beer taps.
Great food and owners!
Its an old neighborhood bar that had its heyday years ago. Still has a nice friendly atmosphere.
Good ambient, I always have a good time here and prices are decent
Good Bar food. However the bar definitely needs a renovation
Great wings and great bartenders
Kathy is the best
Love it
